remarks: Cancelling a term on the right-hand side of a sum in an equality. Consequence of ~ addcan2d .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
muld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addcomd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
addcan2ad.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A + C ) = ( B + C ) ) $.
addcan2ad $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
